title: Bachelor of Science in Integrated Health Science
description: The Integrated Health Science (IHS) degree includes an interdisciplinary curriculum that provides you with solid core knowledge of health and disease prevention, as well as quality delivery and oversight of health services. The integrated health science degree allows you to increase your access to courses in your area of interest while tailoring the program to your healthcare career goals. The Integrated Health Science major will prepare you to become an informed and engaged health professional, think critically about health-related issues, and work as part of a healthcare team to develop innovative solutions for current and future healthcare challenges.
careers: Behavior Analyst, Community Health or Public Health Worker, Pharmacy Sales Representative, Medical and Health Services Management, and Infection Control Manager.
school: Department of Health Promotion and Physical Education
